name: Process Moving Image
description:
We work with brands, film makers, content creators, and storytellers to produce visually stunning and engaging video, film and animation. We are a three strong team founded by Michael Connolly, Oliver Holt and Adam Webster. We are interested in the spaces where narrative meets design and are passionate about pushing ideas and experimenting with new techniques.
Our differing routes and experiences in and around the moving image landscape — coupled with our technical know-how — allow us to deliver creative and inventive solutions on time and on budget. Together, we deliver quality results by collaborating with our clients closely and as early as possible via direct communication. When a project expands we have a trusted network of specialists that we work with, thus keeping our working practice and processes agile. In short, if you need moving image from branded content to multi-platform video to visual effects we can help you, from start to finish.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Unit 4D, 4th Floor Beehive Mill Jersey Street
